# [Interview #836: Orem Signing Report - Zas, Entry #8](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=836#8)

#### Question

How are you so awesome?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Well, I take an awesome pill every morning, it's prescribed, and it sometimes helps out.
